DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to characterize the acute effects of cannabinoids in women relative to men and to begin probing the mechanisms that may underlie gender differences.
DOC.brief_title: Gender Related Differences in the Acute Effects of Delta-9-Tetrahydrocannabinol in Healthy Humans: Sub-Study I
DOC.detailed_description: To characterize the acute effects of oral Dronabinol (10 mg capsule) in women relative to men and to begin probing the mechanisms that may underlie gender differences.
DOC.criteria: At least one lifetime exposure to cannabis Good physical and mental health Cannabis naive individuals Major current or recent stressors Taking estrogen supplements or oral contraceptive pills (for women) Sesame oil allergy
